Component: Icons for General Use

Introduction

Collection of all general icon-based tesla assets we have.

All icons will get the following markup:

  
    [class*="tsla-icon-"] {
      font-family: 'tesla';
      font-style: normal;

      &::after {
        font-family: 'tesla';
        font-style: normal;
      }
    }

Sample markup for each icon will follow this pattern: 

  
    <i class="tsla-icon-angle_left[ tsla-icon_size--large]"></i>

All icons are considered "extras" and are therefore not included in the base installation of Particles. This means that you have to explicitly include it in your Sass files. 
  
  @import "[../]node_modules/@tesla/particles/scss/_particles/extras/icons";

If you are after a single icon, and have no desire to include the entire font stack, each of these icons is also stored in Particles as an SVG asset located here:

  
    node_modules/@tesla/particles/assets/img/icons

tsla-icon-wordmark
tsla-icon-logo

Creating / Adding new icons to the font file

  • Icomoon to organize the font
    • Upload the svg font
  • Transfonter to base64 encode the font.
    • Upload the ttf font
    • Replace base64 data URI in the CSS file with what transfonter provides.
    • Check icons documentation to see if all is well.
